REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1862 reute d f BC-PLENUM-<PLEN>-REINCOR 03-24 0050

TEXT.TITLE: PLENUM <PLEN> REINCORPORATES IN DELAWARE
TEXT.BODY: Plenum Publishing Corp said it has reincorporated in Delaware following shareholder approval yesterday. It said in copnnection with the change -- it had been incorporated in New York -- a five-for-two stock split has gone into effect. Reuter
